channel.title: Data Viz in the Academic Library
channel.description: In this blog, I discuss issues of data visualization as they pertain to an academic library context.

item.title: First Post!
item.description: Hello world, I’m here to blog about data visualization. I’m an academic librarian, so my perspective is on data viz is within the context of academic libraries, but I’ll be blogging about non-library topics as well, such as tools, conferences and experiences with data viz. Thanks for reading!
